description:
Isis is ranked 5th, the Dragon is ranked 4th. Both
wrestlers are coming off a loss. Furthermore, Isis has
been wrestling with a shoulder injury all season; and
the Dragon in her last match submitted 8 times, which
was a US record. This match was a back and forth war,
where both scored high style points and both fingered
the other both brought close to orgasm however, only one got brutally fucked on
the mat in RD4. Very brutally. If you lose on this
mat, then you pay the price.
title: The Goddess(6-3) The Dragon(5-2)
